entries.meaning: Any garment worn underneath others, especially one worn next to the skin; an item of underwear.
examples: Richard DeLongpre: Are you okay, my boy angel?
Allen Gregory DeLongpre: I have a broken heart. And undergarments filled with my own unruly waste.

entries.meaning: (religion, in the plural) Temple garments worn by the followers of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
